title: "Bengaluru Startup Uses AI To Identify & Fix Potholes; Maps Over 50,000 Km City Roads"
excerpt: "When Dipen Babariya encountered a road full of potholes, he decided to develop an AI-based software that examines road health. Today, along with his co-founders, RoadMetrics also generates reports and helps municipalities and private entities fix roads."
